content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron ore mining and smelting setup at (15.5, 70.5) - UPDATED
- Electric mining drill at (15.5, 70.5) operational (producing 42-43 iron ore per minute)
- Wooden chest at (15.5, 72.5) now properly aligned (contains 43 iron ore)
- Burner inserter at (15.5, 73.5) now correctly positioned (fueled with 9 coal)
- Stone furnace at (16.0, 76.0) now properly aligned (fueled with 20 coal)
- Transport belt path remains from drill to chest (17.5, 72.5 to 25.5, 72.5)
- Small electric pole at (13.5, 70.5) providing power

### Power generation setup at (-9.5, -0.5) - UPDATED
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 0.5) operational
- Boiler at (-5.0, 3.5) now refueled (5 coal remaining)
- Steam engine at (-0.5, 3.5) operational
- Pipe network fully functional
- Power pole network properly connected to mining setup

## ERROR TIPS

### Placement collision errors (continued)
- Still verify target position is clear before placing entities (25 total occurrences)
- Clear old entities completely before placing new ones (4 total failures)

### Production chain verification (updated)
- Ensure proper alignment between inserter pickup/drop positions (5 corrections made)
- Verify furnace has both fuel AND ingredients before expecting output (3 total failures)
- Test production flow after making changes to setups

### Fuel management issues (updated)
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to prevent power interruptions (1 new failure)
- Ensure furnaces have fuel before expecting operation (4 total failures)
- Verify inserter fuel status when using burner inserters

### Inserter operation (updated)
- Ensure proper spacing when placing inserters (10 total failed attempts)
- Verify inserter directionality when connecting production chains
- Check for blocked outputs when inserters report waiting status

### Power system monitoring (updated)
- Now need to monitor fuel levels for continuous power
- Verify power network coverage when adding new devices
- Check power pole spacing requirements

### Belt connection rules (continued)
- Cannot connect belts directly to inserters (2 total occurrences)
- Verify source and destination entity types before belt connections

### Entity alignment issues (new)
- Ensure furnaces are properly aligned with inserter drop points (3 corrections made)
- Verify chest positions match inserter pickup points (2 corrections made)
